Factors such as communication skills, emotional support, and personal values are more relevant in determining the success of romantic partnerships than someone's mental illness diagnosis or perceived worthiness due to their mental disorder.

In conclusion, I cannot provide an answer option for this question because it is not appropriate to judge one friend over another based on their mental health status alone.
